translation.DEVICE_REGISTRATION_SUCCESS: Device successfully registered. Add device to hotel from application.
translation.DEVICE_ADDRESS_NOT_SET: The address for this device in Alexa app is not set. Set it up and re launch
translation.NOTIFY_MISSING_PERMISSIONS: Please grant permission to read address from your Alexa app and re launch
translation.DEVICE_REGISTER_ERROR: Uh Oh. Looks like something went wrong. Please try again.
translation.SYSTEM_ERROR: There is some problem with the service. Please try again
translation.DEVICE_NOT_ASSIGNED_TO_HOTEL: This device is not assigned to hotel. Please contact the front desk.
translation.ASK_TO_REGISTER_DEVICE: Would you like to register this device?
translation.ANSWER_WITH_YES_NO: Please answer with a Yes or No.
translation.WELCOME: Hello, {{hotel_name}} front desk. How can I help?
translation.HELP_MESSAGE: I am the assistant for your stay. I can help with facilities available at the hotel, ordering services like food, laundry and also can provide info about this place. How can I help you today?
translation.REPEAT_REQUEST: I did not understand your request. Can you please repeat?
translation.END: Thank you. Please wake me up incase of need; I am here to make your stay pleasant.
translation.ANYTHING_ELSE: Would you like to know anything else?
translation.YES_NO_REPROMPT: Please answer with yes or no.
translation.GOOGLE_NEARBY_API_ERROR: There is some problem with the google nearby search api.
translation.PLACES_NEARBY: Here are few nearby {{slot}}. Option 1 {{nearby1}}, Option 2 {{nearby2}} , Option 3 {{nearby3}}. Would you like details about any of these options ?
translation.PLACES_NEARBY_ALL: Sure. I can tell you about restaurants, movie theatres and other utility places nearby. Which place would you like to know about ?
translation.NO_SLOT_NEARBY: Sorry there is no {{slot}} nearby. Would you like to know about any other place ?
translation.SLOT_NOT_AVAILABLE: Please mention the place you would like to know about.
translation.COMMUNITY_NEARBY_NAME: Option {{option_number}} is {{community_name}}. It is open now.
translation.COMMUNITY_NEARBY_ADDRESS: The address is {{community_address}}. Would you like to book a cab ?
translation.SPECIFIC_COMMUNITY_NEARBY: The nearest {{slot}} is at {{community_address}}. It is open now and has a user rating {{rating}}. Would you like to book a cab ?
translation.NO_FACILITIES: This hotel has all the basic facilities
translation.QUESTION_WANT_ALL_FACILITIES: Would you like to know the full list of facilities?
translation.FACILITY_NOT_AVAILABLE: This hotel does not have the facility {{item}}
translation.ITEM_ORDER_QUESTION: Would you like me to place an order for {{item}}
translation.ORDER_ANYTHING_ELSE: Would you like to order anything else?
translation.ORDER_ASK_ITEM_NAME: What would you like to order?
translation.FACILITY_FOLLOWUP_QUESTION: Would you like to know more about the {{item}}?
translation.ASK_ITEM_NAME: Which item would you like to have?
translation.ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE: We do not see to have {{item_name}}. Would you like anything else?
translation.REPEAT_ORDER_WITHOUT_COUNT: I have taken the order for {{item_name}}
translation.ASK_CONFIRM_ORDER: You have requested for {{items}}. Shall I confirm this order?
translation.TELL_ORDER_CONFIRMED: Your order is confirmed. We will serve your order as soon as possible. Have a nice day
translation.ASK_FOR_ORDER_CANCEL: Shall I cancel your order of {{order}}?
translation.CONFIRM_ORDER_CANCEL: I have canceled your order. Would you like anything else?
translation.ORDER_ITEM_EXISTS_WITH_PRICE: We have {{item_name}} at our hotel and {{price_msg}}
translation.ORDER_IN_PROGRESS: You have ordered {{item_name}} at {{order_time}} and we are working on it.
translation.ORDER_ASK_AGAIN: Would you like to order again?
translation.ORDER_UNABLE_TO_SERVE: Sorry, that we were unable to serve your previous order .
translation.ORDER_TELL_PLACE_AGAIN: I will place your order again.
